actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide for the monthly publication of a Consumer Price Index for the Elderly which shall be used in the provision of cost-of-living benefit increases authorized by title II of the Social Security Act.
short_title: Consumer Price Index for the Elderly Act
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Consumer Price Index for the Elderly Act - Provides for the monthly publication of a Consumer Price Index for the Elderly by the Bureau of Labor Statistics which shall be used in the provision of cost-of-living benefit increases authorized under title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act. Provides that in determining such benefits, the index will be used if it produces a higher benefit payment than the consumer Price Index.

titles.title: Consumer Price Index for the Elderly Act

A bill to provide for the monthly publication of a Consumer Price Index for the Elderly which shall be used in the provision of cost-of-living benefit increases authorized by title II of the Social Security Act.
